author: Source: Hampshire Chronicle
title: Early breakthroughs lift England hopes of improbable victory over Pakistan - Hampshire Chronicle
text:
James Anderson took two wickets in five balls to kickstart England's push for a still improbable victory over Pakistan in the first Test. Anderson struck twice in his second over to reduce the hosts, starting their second innings 75 runs behind, to three for two.
 Hampshire Chronicle.
